HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: unutar 48 sati (osim subote, nedjelje i praznika)
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava na pojedine otoke traje 2-3 dana.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.locations: – nije fizička trgovina – samo web shop –

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The only available shipping method for Croatia is home delivery. In-store pickup is not an option as the company operates exclusively as a webshop. There is no information on parcel shop, parcel locker, or bulky item delivery.

PROVIDERS: DPD is the exclusive courier for all domestic shipments.

PRICING: A flat rate of 5,00 € applies to all deliveries within Croatia. The website does not mention a free shipping threshold. Cash on delivery is listed as a payment option, but any potential surcharge is not specified.

DELIVERY TIMES & RESTRICTIONS: Standard delivery time is within 48 hours, excluding weekends and holidays. Deliveries to certain islands may take longer, around 2-3 days. No specific surcharge for island delivery is mentioned. Weekend delivery is not available.

NOTABLE FEATURES: The company ships to all EU countries with zoned pricing. All items are shipped from their own warehouse.

WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented on a dedicated page and is straightforward. It clearly outlines the cost, provider, and delivery timeframe for Croatia. However, it lacks details regarding a free shipping threshold, potential COD surcharges, and alternative delivery methods. The information on island delivery is limited to an extended timeframe.
